dc.title: Architect of the Capitol - Capitol Flags
dc.description: The Architect of the Capitol fulfills all flag requests from Members of the United States Senate, and the House of Representatives. Flags are flown daily year-round, weather permitting, excluding Thanksgiving Day, Christmas Day and New Year's Day. There are special flag poles where all flags are flown. After it is flown over the Capitol, each flag is issued a keepsake Certificate of Authenticity by the AOC.
